授業方法: Seminar (face-to-face). Based on weekly readings of case studies and class discussions, students will gain a broad understanding of contemporary Japanese pop culture from a business and social science perspective. At the beginning of each class, students will discuss the assigned case study followed by explanations from the instructor, which are supplemented with additional class materials.
